General.Name: Zhuhai Enpower Electric Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhuhai Enpower Electric Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of new energy vehicle power systems in China and internationally. The company offers electric drive systems, comprising all-in-one new energy systems, integrated powertrains, and hybrid dual motor controllers; vehicle power platform products; and motor electronic control unit systems, such as flat wire motors, motor rotor assemblies, electric controls, medium voltage electric controls, and commercial vehicle motor controllers. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Zhuhai, China.

3.Name: Mr. Liuming  Deng
3.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. and Board Sec.
